name: Tab HTML Retriever with Sidebar
description: An extension to get HTML content of all open tabs and display a sidebar.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; media-src https://www.stefanvd.net; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.stefanvd.net; connect-src https://www.stefanvd.net; script-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://www.stefanvd.net * data:; object-src 'none'
